detail: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.
Name: A Quiet Place Part II

detail: The Warrens investigate a murder that may be linked to a demonic possession.
Name: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

detail: The bodyguard Michael Bryce continues his friendship with assassin Darius Kincaid as they try to save Darius's wife Sonia.
Name: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard

detail: THE SPARKS BROTHERS, is a musical odyssey through five weird and wonderful decades with Ron and Russell Mael celebrating the inspiring legacy of Sparks.
Name: The Sparks Brothers

detail: All the rules are broken as a sect of lawless marauders decides that the annual Purge does not stop at daybreak and instead should never end.
Name: The Forever Purge

detail: NBA superstar LeBron James teams up with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes for this long-awaited sequel.
Name: Space Jam: A New Legacy

detail: A fantasy re-telling of the medieval story of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.
Name: The Green Knight

detail: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.
Name: The Suicide Squad

detail: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.
Name: Free Guy

detail: A "spiritual sequel" to the horror film Candyman (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.
Name: Candyman

detail: The movie, based on Marvel Comics, will focus on Shang-Chi; 'The Master of Kung-Fu'.
Name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

detail: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business
Name: The Boss Baby: Family Business

detail: Sequel to the 2018 film 'Venom'.
Name: Venom: Let There Be Carnage

detail: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.
Name: Dune

detail: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
Name: No Time to Die

detail: A young girl, passionate about fashion design, is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s where she encounters her idol, a dazzling wannabe singer. But 1960s London is not what it seems, and time seems to fall apart with shady consequences.
Name: Last Night in Soho

detail: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with her enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with a legendary ancestral creature who came before them.
Name: Antlers

detail: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.
Name: Eternals

detail: Set in 1998, this 'Resident Evil' origin story explains the secrets of the Spencer Mansion and Raccoon City.
Name: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City

detail: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.
Name: West Side Story

detail: A continuation of Spider-Man Far From Home
Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home

detail: When a top-secret weapon falls into mercenary hands, a wild card CIA agent joins forces with three international agents on a lethal mission to retrieve it, while staying a step ahead of a mysterious woman who's tracking their every move.
Name: The 355

detail: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.
Name: Morbius

detail: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.
Name: Death on the Nile

detail: The story is a prequel to the games, starring Holland as a younger Drake, showing us details of how he came to meet and befriend Sully.
Name: Uncharted

detail: The birth of Batman (6 pieces) at the beginning of its birth, Batman was not different from the popular novels with detective themes at that time except wearing bat clothes. He is not so much a hero as a detective.
Name: The Batman

detail: Sequel to the 2016 Marvel film 'Doctor Strange'.
Name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

detail: After settling in Green Hills, Sonic is ready for more freedom, and Tom and Maddie agree to leave him home while they go on vacation. But, no sooner are they gone, when Dr. Robotnik comes back, this time with a new partner, Knuckles, in search for an emerald that has the power to both build and destroy civilizations.
Name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2

detail: Set in Iceland at the turn of the 10th century, a Nordic prince sets out on a mission of revenge after his father is murdered.
Name: The Northman

detail: The sequel to Thor: Ragnarok and the fourth movie in the Thor saga.
Name: Thor: Love and Thunder
